<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of the Spider](/Equipment.aspx?ID=758)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The handle of this wand is a 5-inch-long piece of rosewood, but most of its length is a pair of twisted spider legs covered in gossamer webbing.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_web_](/Spells.aspx?ID=374), but the strands of webbing are envenomed. Any creature that fails their [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check or Reflex save to navigate the web takes 1d6 poison damage.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _web_ of the appropriate level.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"

>
Wand of the Spider (2nd-Level Spell)
</title>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wand of the Spider (4th-Level Spell)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The strands deal 2d6 poison damage plus 1d6 [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
